comment: There exists a δ as in the proof of Lemma 1 in [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 90: 0 < δ < 1 , p >= δ on ` T \ U ` . Here ` D ` is used to represent δ in the paper and ` Q ` to represent ` T \ U ` in the paper. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
